name: Polaris
body: ### Polaris Multi-purpose telegram bot written in Python. I made this for personal use so I won't provide any support or install instructions. ### WARNING THIS PROGRAM IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND ### TODO * ~~Use JSON to store settings and data.~~ * ~~Implement locales.~~ * Change settings and locales without restarting. * Move all plugin documentation to locales. * ~~Use requests instead of pyTelegramBotAPI.~~ * ~~Add group management stuff.~~ * ~~Add user config.~~ * Add channel management stuff. * ~~Add Reminders plugin.~~ * ~~Add Pins plugin.~~ * Add Tags plugin. * Add Polls plugin. * Add YouTube plugin. * Add RSS plugin. * Add LastFM plugin. * Add Reddit plugin.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
